title: Republican Mayor of Arlington, Texas Backs Middle Class Tax Cut Package | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
December 10, 2010

 



Republican Mayor of Arlington, Texas Backs Middle Class Tax Cut Package





Office of the Mayor
	City of Arlington, Texas

	I commend President Obama for making the hard decision to set aside politics and do what is best for the American people. The bipartisan tax cuts package will boost economic growth and provide tangible relief for working families.  Without tax relief and unemployment assistance, the road to economic recovery would be very challenging.  This legislation gives families and businesses in Arlington the opportunity to improve their quality of life and invest back into the community.
